title: Heimerdinger Nerf or remake! needed or not ?
body: Hey guys! i've been playing for years now, mainly in the ranked system as it's more fun! i've jumped up and down from high silver to high bronze! but right now I think there's a massive problem! Heimendinger! this champion is impossible to gank, has lane domination, high damage out put, a stun/slow, and cannons that put out high damage per second with him just having to run or zhonya's! he can solo baron/drag, legit gets double kills if trying to gank him! He needs a remake! somehow to make him even with other mid laners! why should people be zoned all of the laning phase because he puts up turrets that put out high damage? who's that fun for? for years i've tried to counter him when i verse him with all different types of champions and have never been successful! does anyone else share the same problem ? do they have an issue with his mechanics?{{champion:74}}

replies.body: I can consistently beat him with karma, sion, gnar, galio. U can farm safely vs him as shen. And tell your idiot forestguy not to gank.

> 
> seriously, anyone who struggles vs a heimer....needs to uninstall.

really dude? all he needs to do is set up the turrets in the middle of mid lane and it zones most mid lane champs and with that the power of a gank gets halfed. this is the reason hes so squishy is bc if you play him so that he is in range of attacks you aren't playing him right.
learn to take out his turrets then....90% of mid lane champs outrange them, all you need to do is sidestep the skillshot blast which is really slow and easy to dodge and even easier to time.

Wherein Heimerdinger can easily land a stun or easy slow dealign high damage which makes it even harder to dodge the three turrets that are still aiming at you or his high damaging rockets.
It's not worth walking up to turrets to try and kill them most of the time.
"weaker than .... any mid laner ... he gets destroyed top" what?
Play Karthus or Vel'Koz against him. He will rue the day he ever picked Heimerdinger.
Simply one of those champions that make lane phase hell for a large minority of the champion pool for mid.

I don't know much about Heim mechanics, but I would recommend if you are struggling against something, LEARN TO PLAY THEM!

Either they are hard counterable like you think, and you get a lot of wins.
Or you can learn how he is countered by judging why you lose. :)

The worst case you end up doing badly playing them, and find out what makes you lose when you do. The best case, you have a fun new main to play. :D
